about_the_game:
"HIYOKU NO TORI" is a mystery adventure game with choices.

FEATURES


  • An occult mystery set in Kyoto, the ancient capital of Japan.
  • Multi-ending story with seven different endings.
  • Full voice support in two languages: Japanese and Chinese
  • "Tokyo Active NEETs" participated with background music.

STORY


One day, a woman, victim of a stalker, rushed into Kamotan.
The detectives, including Tatsumi, considered accepting her request to track down the stalker,
but she confessed that the stalking had finished and there was no more danger.

The female client told them that she had visited a shrine famous for breaking connections with people and prayed for her wish to come true.
After that, her stalker died. She was utterly upset by the thought that her wish caused his death. Is this what really happened?

Kamotan members began their investigation to get to the bottom of the truth.

CHARACTER


Tatsumi Ohsato
CV: Masaaki Mizunaka / Zhihao Qiao



Former detective with Camotan. He has special abilities.
He has a strong sense of justice and is serious and kind.

Hyogo Ohtori
CV: Sho Karino / Jax wang



The head of the Kamoin Detective Agency, known for solving mysterious cases.
He is a mentalist by nature. He has excellent observational skills.

Kosaku Minobe
CV: Yu Miyazaki / Zhi An



He's well known in the underworld as a genius hacker.
But for some reason, he is in Kamotan. Extremely shy.

Renji Kujiki
CV: Daisuke Hirakawa / Jin Yang



He is an excellent communicator.
He is always roaming the streets at night, but he cannot drink.

STAFF


＜Character Design＞
Nitaka

＜Scenario＞
Yuzuko Asai

＜Sound Designer＞
Ryusei Akai (Tokyo Active NEETs)
RYU (BLOOD STAIN CHILD)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (Windows RT and 10 Mobile are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core i Processor Series (Low Voltage Processor is not supported)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card that supports DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: A pointing device required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (Windows RT and 10 Mobile are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core i Processor Series (Low Voltage Processor is not supported)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card that supports DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: A pointing device required

short_description: An occult-mystery-adventure game set in Kyoto—detectives investigate to solve bizarre and complex cases. What did Kamotan detectives finally uncover on their way to the truth of these cryptic incidents?
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
